general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are critical. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. Spread polythene in irrigation channels. Mulch coconut leaves. Cover with paper caps on the newly planted vegetable seedlings. Harvest fingerlings in shallow ponds. Manage yellow stem borer in paddy. Manage blast disease. Manage tobacco caterpillar. Manage early shoot borer in Sugarcane. Manage brinjal shoot and fruit borer. Prevent whitefly infestation in okra. Properly store harvested onions. Control mango hopper.

advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are critical. Water deficit during these stages should be avoided.
To manage brinjal shoot and fruit borer, install pheromone traps and use neem-based pesticides. Go for chemical control with specific insecticides.
To prevent whitefly infestation in okra, treat seeds before sowing and use yellow sticky traps during crop growth.
After harvesting onions, cut tops and dry bulbs properly for storage.
To control mango hoppers, spray specific insecticides or apply smoke below the plants.
